Delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ordinary_Truck, Refrigerated_Truck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract Truck class, used for implementing Ordinary Truck and Refrigerated Truck
    Author:
    Brendan Doncaster
    See Also:
    Ordinary_Truck, Refrigerated_Truck

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Truck()
      Constructor method for default Truck, should not be used

    • Method Detail

      • getTruckType

        public java.lang.String getTruckType()
        Getter method for truck's type
        Returns:
        String representation of the type of truck

      • getCargo

        public Stock getCargo()
        Getter method for the truck's cargo
        Returns:
        Stock that makes up the truck's cargo

      • truckCapacity

        public int truckCapacity()
        Getter method for the truck's maximum capacity
        Returns:
        Int that represents the maximum amount of items the truck can store

      • getTruckSize

        public int getTruckSize()
        Get the truck's current amount of items
        Returns:
        Sum of the amount of all items within the truck's cargo

      • getRemainingCapacity

        public int getRemainingCapacity()
        Get the remaining capacity for the truck
        Returns:
        Amount of items that can still fit into the truck's cargo

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(Item item,
                       int amount)
                throws StockException
        Truck wrapper for Stock's subtractItem method
        Parameters:
        item - Item to be removed
        amount - Quantity of the item to be removed
        Throws:
        StockException - Exception thrown from Stock's subtractItem method

      • getCargoItem

        public int getCargoItem(Item item)
        Truck wrapper for Stock's getAmount method
        Parameters:
        item - Item to get the amount of
        Returns:
        Amount of given item that is in the truck's cargo

      • getTemp

        public abstract java.lang.Double getTemp()
                                  throws DeliveryException
        Get the coldest temperature required by an item within truck's cargo
        Returns:
        Double value of the coldest temperature
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - Refrigerated truck with no refrigerated item

      • truckCost

        public abstract double truckCost()
                          throws DeliveryException
        Calculate the cost of the truck
        Returns:
        double value for the cost of the truck
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - Refrigerated Truck can't be calculated because it lacks a refrigerated item

      • addItem

        public abstract void addItem(Item item,
                             int amount)
                      throws DeliveryException,
                             StockException
        Adds an item to the truck's cargo
        Parameters:
        item - Item to add to the cargo
        amount - Quantity of the item to add
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - Item exceeds cargo space or temperature is invalid
        StockException - Item attempts to add invalid amount

      • addItemName

        public abstract void addItemName(java.lang.String string,
                                 int amount)
                          throws DeliveryException,
                                 StockException
        Adds an item to the truck's cargo based on its name
        Parameters:
        string - name of an Item to add to the cargo
        amount - Quantity of the item to add
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - Item exceeds cargo space or temperature is invalid
        StockException - Item's name is not found in the store
